meanings.definition: A molecule composed entirely of carbon, in the form of a hollow sphere, ellipsoid, or tube.
meanings.sent1: Scientists are studying fullerenes to understand their unique structure.
meanings.sent2: The discovery of fullerenes opened up new possibilities in nanotechnology.
meanings.sent3: The fullerenes at the molecular party were the life of the carbon chain!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a universe filled with swirling fullerenes of thoughts.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the fullerenes looked like tiny soccer balls made of carbon.

meanings.definition: A class of carbon allotropes consisting of a series of closed-cage structures.
meanings.sent1: Fullerenes exhibit unique properties due to their closed-cage structures.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are exploring the potential applications of fullerenes in various industries.
meanings.sent3: The fullerenes in the carbon family reunion were always the most stylish.
meanings.sent4: In her artwork, she depicted the city skyline as a forest of fullerenes.
meanings.sent5: The fullerenes in nature's design seemed to hold the secrets of the universe within their carbon walls.
